body: How is it has full censorship and uncensored at the same time? smh
METROID I enjoy NTR with no problems, I dislike bad writing with no endings

the ones being NTR'd are the readers. He's dangling some type of consequence infront of the readers time after time when really nothing is going to happen with the husband. Im already sick of these writing methods.
interesting, what will the guy do now
Y'know, if the kid really wanted to punish Yoshioka, he'd send the stuff to Yoshioka's job instead of Yoshioka himself. But then again, it looks like he snapped, so whatever.
